channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Sterling File Gateway
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Sterling File Gateway

item.title: CVE-2018-1470|2024-08-05T03:59:39.178Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2.0 through 2.2.6 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to obtain sensitive information displayed in the URL that could lead to further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 140688.

item.title: CVE-2017-1550|2024-08-05T13:39:30.598Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2 could allow an authenticated user to change other user's passwords. IBM X-Force ID: 131290.

item.title: CVE-2017-1632|2024-08-05T13:39:31.873Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 133178.

item.title: CVE-2017-1544|2024-08-05T13:32:30.287Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Standard Edition (IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2.0 through 2.2.6) caches usernames and passwords in browsers that could be used by a local attacker to obtain sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 130812.

item.title: CVE-2017-1549|2024-08-05T13:32:30.282Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 131289.

item.title: CVE-2017-1497|2024-08-05T13:32:30.261Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2 could allow an unauthorized user to view files they should not have access to providing they know the directory location of the file. IBM X-Force ID: 128695.

item.title: CVE-2017-1548|2024-08-05T13:32:30.264Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2 could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to view arbitrary files on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 131288.

item.title: CVE-2017-1487|2024-08-05T13:32:30.264Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2 could allow an authenticated attacker to obtain sensitive information such as login ids on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 128626.

item.title: CVE-2018-1563|2024-08-05T04:07:44.043Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Standard Edition (IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2.0 through 2.2.6) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 142967.

item.title: CVE-2018-1398|2024-08-05T03:59:39.057Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2.0 through 2.2.6 could allow a remote attacker to download certain files that could contain sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 138434.

item.title: CVE-2017-1575|2024-08-05T13:39:31.976Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Standard Edition (IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2.0 through 2.2.6) uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow a local attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 132032.

item.title: CVE-2023-47714|2024-06-04T17:26:44.843Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 6.0.0.0 through 6.0.3.9, 6.1.0.0 through 6.1.2.3, and 6.2.0.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 271531.

item.title: CVE-2023-47714|2024-08-02T21:16:43.653Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 6.0.0.0 through 6.0.3.9, 6.1.0.0 through 6.1.2.3, and 6.2.0.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 271531.
